name: Krowdthink Ltd
goal:
Developer of a privacy preserving, secure-by-design, location based social engagement platform.
Building counter-terror features into the platform as of end 2017 under funding direct from UK Office of Counter Terrorism to make crowded places safer.
Company also advocates human rights in the digital data context.
interests: Communication, Competition, Consumers, Digital economy and society, International co-operation and development, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Research and innovation
euInitiatives:
GDPR - General Data Protection regulation
E-Privacy and PECR (Privacy of Electronic Regulation)
Smart City - Citizen Engagement
